name: All Through the Town
description:
• In the game, the player takes control of the average bus driver and must deal with instant death roadblocks in a monopolized city while getting your passengers to their destination in time.
  • The gameplay highlights all the excitement your friendly neighborhood bus driver experiences on the job.
  • Take control with one of the most simple control schemes in existence, it's so easy your grandparents wouldn’t even struggle.

Assets Used
